villager.name: villager
villager.mission: survive with the rest of the good team

investigator.name: investigator
investigator.mission: investigate another player (every night) and get a clue about their role

doctor.name: doctor
doctor.mission: protect yourself or another player (every night)

mayor.name: mayor
mayor.description: influential, sarcastic and a bit political

trapper.name: trapper
trapper.mission: trap another player (every night), which blocks their ability that night

godfather.name: godfather
godfather.description: the boss, big G, the head of the mafia. Say hello to their little friend >:)

mafioso.name: mafioso
mafioso.description: a skilled and deadly member of the mafia
mafioso.mission: vote to kill another player during the night

surgeon.name: surgeon
surgeon.description: you are a master of disguise, but just not with clothes
surgeon.mission: restructure someones face (or yours) to make evil players look good

witch.name: witch
witch.description: a infamous spell caster, known to use dark magic to get what you want
witch.mission: cast a spell to make another player (expect mafia) unable to use their ability for the night

framer.name: framer
framer.description: you always tell the truth, just some parts of it ;)
framer.mission: frame another player, making them look like a evil player

jester.name: jester
jester.description: fool, a clown, a full out jokster

serial_killer.name: serial_killer
serial_killer.description: you are hungry for blood, hungry for killing, hungry for death

executioner.name: executioner
executioner.description: you are a feared and precise executioner - waiting for the right moment
executioner.mission: make your target get voted out. You become the jester if your target is killed

lawyer.name: lawyer
lawyer.description: sharp, determined, focused - you will protect your client at any cost
lawyer.mission: make your client (evil or neutral) win
